page.title: 06Industry:Ponders End
page.content: The major industry of this area of the Lea Valley is{Merck Sharp Dohme Ltd. a{chemical}firm.There are a few food companies such as {Cabernet Wines and {Co.,Geary's Bakery and Wright's Flour {Mill.} Other interesting industries include electrical industries like{British {Central Electrical,Bush and Thorn EMI. Metallurgical industries include { {Pollo Metals,L.Gardener Steel,and {Leaside Steel.}Some of the other firms are {Faultless Precast Ltd and Barget {Kitchens.Serk Service and Ford}deal with cars.Not all the factories are in use,some are empty and some to let.
